pkgmetadata.longdescription: Adjusted Bayesian Quantile Regression Inference // Adjusted inference for Bayesian quantile regression based on asymmetric Laplace working likelihood, for details see Yang, Y., Wang, H. and He, X. (2015), Posterior inference in Bayesian quantile regression with asymmetric Laplace likelihood, International Statistical Review, 2015 doi:10.1111/insr.12114.
